Text.val: 19.02.2013 AS SCR#17967 scrambled debtor name in case of demo user
18.09.2012 AS SCR#17571 fixed hardcoded library name in direct SQL

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DEBC_NO, DEBC_DEBH, DEBC_DEBC, DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH from :1/debc a INNER JOIN :1/DEBH b ON b.debh_no=a.debc_debh INNER JOIN :1/DEBB c ON c.debb_debc_no=a.debc_no INNER JOIN :1/CLNT d ON d.clnt101_admno=a.debc_admno and d.clnt102_clntno=a.debc_clntno WHERE debc_datdeleted IS NULL AND (DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO) IN (select CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO from :1/clnt where CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO=:2 and CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO =:3) AND (DEBC_CREDITLIMIT IS NOT NULL AND DEBC_CREDITLIMIT>=0 OR DEBC_FINANCELIMIT IS NOT NULL AND DEBC_FINANCELIMIT>=0 OR DEBC_REINSURANCELIM IS NOT NULL AND DEBC_REINSURANCELIM>=0 OR DEBB_ACTINVAH <> 0) AND (debc_debh=:4 OR DEBC_DEBH IN (SELECT DEBH_NO from :1/debh where DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=:5))

Text.val: reinsurance limit is recalculated to admin currency
